official_title: A concurrent resolution calling for recognition by the United States of the present Government of Angola and for the establishment of full diplomatic relations between the United States and Angola.

summary.text: Full Recognition of Angola Resolution- Calls upon the President to recognize and establish full diplomatic relations with the Government of Angola. Declares that Congress will not repeal the Clark Amendment to the Internal Security and Development Corporation Act of 1980 (prohibiting assistance for military or paramilitary operations in Angola) until the United States has recognized the Government of Angola and the Namibia question has been resolved.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling for recognition by the United States of the present Government of Angola and for the establishment of full diplomatic relations between the United States and Angola.
